title: How to entertain myself without electrical gadgets - Quora

response.answer_text: Before I answer your question, let me tell you something how beautiful life is without gadgets: All of us are spend time in nature and having fun out there, we all do reckless, dumb things in our life and parents keep scolding us for what are we did. It's kinda humiliated but it's fun to do. Life of people without gadgets are calm, helpful, and always energetic for things to do in their life, even we follow our parents order for us we don't denied, and they're always proud for us to do helpful things for them. As for your question now, there are plenty of ways to entertain yourself without gadgets. Make a journal about yourself or your family, friends, neighborhood, etc.Draw something good or bad (No one's expecting you silly to draw, it's fun to do.)Do exercise everyday (any exercises like sit ups, push-ups, walk, run, etc.)Spend time outside, view the beautiful nature out there.Plan a To-Do list (This keeps you schedule in and out, everytime, everyday)Make friends, and be helpful and guide for people who have poor life.Instead of no gadgets zone, try reading a book that makes you calm down.Doesn't matter if you are single, married person out there, you just need to keep yourself busy, and remember: Life of people seeks fun and entertainment in the world.

Staying away from electronic devices makes your life calm, peaceful, healthy and natural. You can have more fun in your life without using these gadgets. You can do the followings. Reading is the best way of having fun, since you already have this habbit its really cool, keep it. You can go on walks alone. This will help you knowing more about yourself and will also refresh your mind. You can perform random active kindness, like going out helping someone, be someone’s hero. Spread love. This will give you self satisfaction and joy. Go to some random places. Talk to the people over there, make some friends and try to grab their positive thoughts. Make a list of those. If you like sports you can also play outdoor games like cricket, football, badminton etc. Spend time with your families. Go out with them. Spend time with your grandparents. They can tell you more secrets on enjoying life without gadgets. :) Well now a funny one. Lock yourself in a room, or you can do it openly also, and start singing all your favourite songs. This will surely entertain you. Last but not the least, have a habbit of writting. Try to pen down each and everything you experience whole day daily. This will probably put a smile on your face each night. Hope these ideas will help you. Enjoy life to the fullest, coz you have only one. Be happy and keep smiling. :)
